register.view_mode_msg: Enter view mode using the account viewmode@gmail.com to log in directly.
register.login_directly_msg: Login directly to enter the admin page

inputPrompt.password_pattern_incorrect: Please enter a password with at least 8 characters, including both letters and numbers.

ticketPage.ticket_announcement: Choose up to 10 tickets per purchase
ticketPage.join_us_content: Get a $50 discount on all theaters instantly

seats.remaining_seat_alert: There is {{count}} seat left to be selected
seats.exceeded_seat_selected: You have exceeded the number of tickets purchased

copy.coupon_content: Enjoy a romantic movie night with your loved one at Taiwan's most luxurious cinema. Our couple's package includes 2 movie tickets, 2 gourmet dishes, and cocktails. Originally priced at NT$1,230, now only NT$999.
copy.invite_title: Share the movie magic with a friend and get 23% off your tickets
copy.invite_link_share_content: Share your unique link and your friend will receive 2 movie tickets at a 23% discount
copy.invite_friend_register_content: When your friend signs up, you'll both receive 2 movie tickets at a 23% discount and 200 reward points.
copy.invite_get_benefit_content: When your friend purchases 2 or more movie tickets within 2 months, you'll receive a movie ticket at a 23% discount

screenCheck.join_us_content: Sign up to get a $50 discount on all theaters instantly

order.payment_reminder_message: This is a test environment. No charges will be processed. You may enter any card number
order.credit_card_input_invalid_card_month_(01: Expiration month must be between 01 and 12
order.credit_card_input_invalid_card_year_(YYY: Please enter the last two digits of the year. For example, for 2024, enter 24.
order.credit_card_input_invalid_card_cvc_3-dig: Please enter the 3-digit CVV code on the back of your card.
order.click_next_button_to_checkout: Click 「Next」button to proceed to checkout and enter the ECPay page
order.ecpay_alert_notification: You will be redirected to EC Pay for a test payment. No actual charges will be made. You can complete the checkout process.
order.booking_complete_content: Please check your email or log in to your member center to view your booking details.

title_out.select_seat_timeout_content: Seat selection has timed out after 2 minutes. Please start your booking again.

ErroMsg.err_netowrk: Unable to connect to the server. Please contact the server administrator or check your network.
